name: Sovetskaia Kul'tura Digital Archive (East View)
description: Full image, searchable digital archive of Sovetskaia kul'tura, previously published under the titles Rabochii i iskusstvo (1929-1930), Sovetskoe iskusstvo (1931-1941), Literatura i iskusstvo (1942-1944), Sovetskoe iskusstvo (1944-1952) and Sovetskaia kul'tura (1953-1991). Reviews of literature, theater, cinematography and arts document changing attitudes toward Soviet and Russian arts and culture.
